about.me: I am a dedicated website and mobile app designer with a strong passion for UI effects, animations, and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences. I thrive on bringing innovative ideas to life and ensuring seamless interactions for users.
about.m2: Full stack developer with an experience of designing, developing and maintaining web as well as mobile applications. Possesses diverse experience of creating multiple highly scalable applications using different tech stacks

Qualifications.Diplomatxt: Specialized Institute of Applied Information Technology
Qualifications.jobtext: Working in an marketing company (GM solution SARL) with IT solutions
Qualifications.SwD: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER at forium GmbH , Berlin, Germany (www.forium.de).
Qualifications.inper: SOFTWARE DEVELOPER at INperfektion GmbH, wegberg, Deutschland (www.inperfektion.de).

steuer.suptitle: Freelance work at forium GmbH (Berlin, Germany).
steuer.text1: I was working with a mobile app development team (forium GmbH).
steuer.text2: I have implemented various new features in the steuergo mobile app (SteuerGo - Deine Steuer - App).
steuer.text3: Communication was mainly based MS Teams.

inperfcktion.suptitle: Remote work at INperfektion GmbH (wegberg, Deutschland).
inperfcktion.text1: I have successfully designed and implemented numerous applications and website that have streamlined processes and improved user experiences
